characters.name: Victor Moon
characters.desc: Son of two skilled craftsmen, he is branching off from his family trade to study magic.

characters.name: Ivenna Brightheart
characters.desc: Daughter of a prestigious mage lineage who dreams to bridge the gap between Mages and Craftsmen.

details.title: Geography
details.body: A magical floating island, held up by mysterious rocks known as Arcana Crystals.

details.title: People
details.body: Mages (attuned to Arcana Crystals, can channel their powers) and Craftsmen (use Arcana Crystals to create and power technology)

details.title: Arcana Crystals
details.body: Mysterious rocks with magical properties. Legend says that they were created from the remains of an ancient beast.

characters.name: Delete me
characters.desc: I am to be a demonstration for how to delete characters!

details.title: Delete me
details.body: I am to be a demonstration for how to delete pages!

story.title: Delete me
story.body: I am to be a demonstration for how to delete pages!
